about_the_game:
The Vampire, Nosferatu has risen...

Demons have returned to Morvania...

Welcome to Lycanthorn II!

Lycanthorn II - Rain of Beasts is a 3d homage to retro classics. Explore an open world and use different characters to explore dungeons and lands full of demons and beasts from legend.

With First Person melee combat, you'll dash, dodge and dice around your enemies! Not a fan of melee? Try out the other characters that each have a variety of attacks.

Lycanthorn II includes:
  • 4 Playable Characters to Recruit on your journey
  • A massive overworld with sights to see and explore
  • 8 Dungeons to pillage
  • Tons of challenging enemies and boss battles
  • A hot Werewolf girl
  • Download now!

A humongous thank you to Lukamusics for providing music for this game, please give him all the love you can.
As well as Sgt. Shivers for helping me with some code, sprites, and texture work!
Thank you to Foxtongue for making the Steam release possible!

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the creatures in this game have vaguely sexual themes. There are a few bare pixelated breasts, and an enemy resembling male genitalia.

The Vampire, Nosferatu has risen...

Demons have returned to Morvania...

Welcome to Lycanthorn II!

Lycanthorn II - Rain of Beasts is a 3d homage to retro classics. Explore an open world and use different characters to explore dungeons and lands full of demons and beasts from legend.

With First Person melee combat, you'll dash, dodge and dice around your enemies! Not a fan of melee? Try out the other characters that each have a variety of attacks.

Lycanthorn II includes:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.16+, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything capable of running OpenGL 4.0 (eg. ATI Radeon HD 57xx or Nvidia GeForce 400 and higher)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Your favorite Linux distro
  • Graphics: Anything capable of running Vulkan

name: Lycanthorn II - Rain of Beasts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU - anything capable of running OpenGL 4.0 (eg. ATI Radeon HD 57xx or Nvidia GeForce 400 and higher)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0b compatible 16-bit sound card and latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lycanthorn II is 3D homage to games of old. You play as Rain, a Vampire Hunter, on her quest to slay Nosferatu.
